alert.note: Alert for Goodhue; Rice; Steele (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 4:00PM CDT until July 24 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Steele County in south central Minnesota... Southwestern Goodhue County in southeastern Minnesota... Southeastern Rice County in south central Minnesota... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 400 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Nerstrand, or 10 miles southeast of Northfield, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Kenyon around 415 PM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
